name: theburger
description: The Ultimate Burger Lister! is an app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, this app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured.   Each burger in the waiting area also has a 'Eat it now!' button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page.   Your app will store every burger in a database, whether devoured or not.
author: Emily
